channel.title: Test intrusion into a website
channel.description:
I want to invade but I tried the way I know, but it is not successful, it have a waf (firewall)
我想入侵但是我尝试了我知道的办法，但是不成功，有waf（防火墙）
URL： http://moodle.hzcyzx.net IP：115.236.175.189:80 Server:Apache/2.4.29 (Ubuntu)
![TIM%E6%88%AA%E5%9B%BE20190327190311|690x312](upload://5Iqm47otcwTeU5HjEk6SkQvYlZ7.png) Have an sql may be is MySQL 有个数据库，好像是MySQL
![TIM%E6%88%AA%E5%9B%BE20190327190330|690x359](upload://bByetXOSE1MCRFIm84C0xYg6PAb.png) Can upload webshell but can't connect, it can be compressed. 能上传webshell但是连不上，可以被压缩了。
:basketball:https://0x00sec.org/t/python-tool-library/11983:basketball:
